resources.string: This is the home page and will act as a hub for the user to navigate throughout the app
This is the album page, this page should display all albums on a users phone upon clicking an album cover the user will be taken to a activity showing the songs in that album
This is the artist page, this page should display all artists on a users phone, upon clicking an artist will be taken to a page showing the songs for that artist
This is the song page, this page should display all songs on a users phone,upon clicking a song it should take you to the now playing page
This is the now playing page, this page should play the song selected by the user
